name: mhbo-js
description: A JS wrapper for interacting with the MHBO API.
author: MHBO Inc.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./lib; flow-copy-source src lib; flow-remove-types src/ -d lib/; prettier --write ./lib/*.js ./lib/**/*.js
scripts.release: yarn run build; find ./lib -type f -name "*.test.js" -delete; find ./lib -type f -name "*.flow.js" -delete
